title: Grande at Riverview Conshohocken 2 BR 2 BA w/ loft
description:
Unit will be available early January. Beautiful well-maintained top floor 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom condo with loft at the Grande at Riverview in Conshohocken.
1,482 sq. ft. Keswick with loft model
*would consider renting partially furnished for an additional fee and deposit*
Includes two parking spots in the garage underneath the building. You never have to worry about rain or snow!
Beautiful kitchen features a breakfast bar, 42" cherry cabinets, stainless steel appliances, 5 burner gas stove, large under-mount sink w/ garbage disposal, Corian countertops, tile backsplash, hardwood floors, and pantry.
The living room has vaulted ceilings and sliding doors that lead to your own private balcony with a large storage closet.
The large master bedroom has two closets (one is a large walk-in). The master bath includes a double sink, tub, and separate stall shower with glass enclosure.
The second bedroom has two large closets and access to the other bathroom. The second bathroom has a tub shower combo with a glass enclosure, lots of shelves for storage, and access to the hallway. Note the walls are now a lighter blue gray color (will upload new photo soon).
The hallway includes a large closet with a high capacity front-loading washer and dryer (both less than one year old; newer than the ones in the photo), along with plenty of shelves for storage.
The large loft overlooks the living room and is a great space for a home office, guest room, or just lots of extra storage. It includes a ceiling fan and closet.
Unit has gas heating and central A/C. Tenant is responsible for cable/internet/phone and gas and electricity. Water is included in rent.
The Grande is a wonderful community that features a fitness center, courtyard with grills, outdoor swimming pool, and plenty of parking for guests. The Grande is a short walk from tons of restaurants, bars, and shopping in Conshohocken. The Schuylkill River Trail runs right behind the Grande, and the SEPTA Manayunk/Norristown Line is just steps away. You have easy access to all major highways (76, 476, PA turnpike).
No smoking. No pets.

title: @@Looking Beautiful Renovated 2 bedroom Apartment! (Norristown. PA)
description:
@@Looking Beautiful 2 bedroom  1 bathroom apartment for rent in Norristown. PA. Beautiful newly renovated Victorian two story house with 2-bedrooms, two full baths, one on each floor, wood floors, two large living rooms, kitchen with dining room, laundry room, basement, storage room and two off street parking spaces (1,703 sq. ft.). House is within walking distance of downtown Norristown. This apartment very close to Suburban Community Hospital. Property includes a large back yard. All utilities (gas, electric, trash, cable & internet) and snow removal are the responsibility of the tenant. pets  ok  or smoking please, max 6 occupants.
If you are interest please contract and  give your number Thomas  will call you.
Thank You.

title: Lovely bi-level apartment becoming available Now
description:
Lovely bi-level apartment becoming available Now
Located at 239 Fairmount Ave (#1) in the highly desirable Northern Liberties section of Philadelphia, we have a lovely bi-level apartment becoming available now. The apartment features one large bedroom and one full bathroom. There are hardwood floors on the main level and tiled floors on the lower level and bathroom. The kitchen has plenty of counter/cabinet space and is equipped with an electric stove, refrigerator, and dishwasher. The apartment has a lot of character and there is ample space to get creative and really make the place your own. Plenty of closet space. For your convenience, there is a washer/dryer in the unit. Pets are negotiable. Public transportation is easily assessable. Just a short stroll to Piazza at Schmidt's, bars, restaurants, CVS, Riteaid, etc etc.
Central A/C
Main Floor Laundry, washer/dryer in the unit
Please contact us for further information

description:

Indoor/outdoor pool(s), walking trails, community center, gym, tot lots, nature preserve—The list goes on! In close proximity to BWI, NSA/Fort Meade, all major highways & PLENTY of shopping/dining. Wonderful 2 bed, 2 bath condo in sought after Johns Hopkins Homewood! New carpet throughout, freshly painted, upgraded bathrooms and lots of natural light. The Geneva offers a beautiful historical preservation just steps from the university and within walking distance to the Baltimore Museum of Art plus the shops and restaurants in Charles Village. The private entrance off the side of the building provides quick and easy access to this spacious unit. When you step inside you will be amazed at the size of the living room and kitchen - both are very large! Kitchen can accommodate a table easily. Access to the main hallway is through one of the bedrooms which provides an interior path to the laundry area. There is a lovely shared garden space on the opposite side of the building. title: Beautiful 4 Bedroom Townhome in Old Kensington
description:
Recently updated with new floors and paint, this 4 bedroom, 1 bath is corner situated, 3 story, 17 feet wide, and offers over 1,800 square feet of living space, includes a private yard.
The 2nd floor has 2 bedrooms and a large hall bath. The front bedroom has a has a double wide built in closet and the middle bedroom has a large built in closet as well. The 3rd floor includes 2 equally spacious bedrooms. The front bedroom has a double wide wardrobe with glass slider doors that have built-in led lights.
The luxury of having so many rooms at your disposal creates an opportunity to craft a living space that fits your needs such as a home office, guest rooms, a studio, a den, study, etc.
The basement level is absolutely huge with more than 6 feet of head room and a speckled painted floor It has a laundry area and endless storage options.
The location is a walkers paradise as well since it is in close proximity to a variety of restaurants, cafes, shopping, and social spots in Old Kensington, Fishtown, and Northern Liberties such as Helm, Luna Cafe, Reanimator, Hook & Master, Front St Cafe, Laser Wolf, Streetside, etc. Nearby parks such as Cruz Playground, Benson Park, Hancock Playground, Liberty Lands Park.
$35 Application Fee
First, Last, and Security Deposit Due at Signing
Tenant Pays Utilities
Pets Negotiable
Renter is responsible for utilities. First, last, and security due at signing.

title: Great Quality Balcony Easy-Lifestyle 2-bed apt*Move-In Ready!
description:
Hamilton St
Immaculately Maintained and Move-In Ready! Great Quality Balcony Easy-Lifestyle 2-bed apartment in Philadelphia, PA. Large bonus room, hardwood flooring, central vacuum system, natural gas log fireplace, double hung vinyl tilt-in windows, all kitchen appliances included, large laundry room, plenty of closets and good storage space, metal roof and so much more! Fabulous curb-appeal with beautiful landscaping, level 1/2 acre lot, tree-lined backyard, front and back covered porches, 2 car garage. Only 1 block away from the Bus Stop! 1 block away from Drexel Park, 10min walk from Drexel Gym, and less than 1 mile away from UPenn Library and University of Wharton! This apartment is located on a really cozy and quite street of Hamilton and it is quick to get to any location within University of Drexel or UPenn.

title: A Great Place To Have Wonderful Times And make new Friends
description: A rare find! Easy living in Hersheys Mill, cute one bedroom unit in friendly Ashton Village, Low Association Dues INCLUDES. .. .. water, sewer, security, cable, outside maintenance, snow removal to your door, and all the amenities that come with Hersheys Mill. Nice home with an open concept Living Room Dining room with a fireplace, and a dining area slider with a key lock to a to a covered deck for easy access. . It has a huge master bedroom with slider to a private patio. A great place to have wonderful times and make new friends. Hersheys Mill has something for everyone. Walking Trails, Bocce, shuffle board, outdoor pool, library, horseshoes, pickle ball, ping pong, billiards, gardening plots, bridge, quilting, memberships are open to its golf course and social membership to it's on site restaurant. Their are other clubs too many to mention but range from exercise, sewing, book clubs, bowling , not to mention the state of the art Wood Shop.

title: Beautiful well maintained 5-bedroom 2 bath, Row Townhouse for rent
description: WELCOME HOME! This beautiful well maintained 5-bedroom, 2 full bath, Row home. This home is located near many great schools such as LaSalle University, Penn Charter School, and Germantown Friends School. Walking up to the front door, you will see an enclosed front patio, perfect for a Garden and some relaxing.  Upon entering the front door, you are greeted with an open straight-through floorplan. This spacious open-flow floor plan features a NEW updated kitchen, NEW appliances, NEW carpets, and NEW remodeled bathrooms on the 1st and 2nd Floor. On your way to the kitchen, you will notice beautiful white cabinets, white tile backsplash, Granite countertops, and new stainless-steel appliances.  PLUS! Laundry room at the back of the house. Followed up with a full Bathroom. Along with Having Two staircases to get to the second floor you also have Cable Railings throughout the house as well. Not to Mention Recess lighting throughout. The second floor has 3 Nice sized bedrooms and a full bathroom with a white tub/shower and new vanity. Proceeding to the 3rd floor there are 2 neatly laid out bedrooms with another closet Nicely laid out in the hallway. NEW HVAC throughout. Fully fenced in yard area. The basement is great for storage Giving you ample amount of space for all your storage.  A rear yard that will provide the perfect outdoor space for BBQ-ING in the summer. There are laundry hookups and space for a home-office. Come see this gem now, before it is scooped up! Seller is offering a 1 year home warranty as well!Email me with your cell number for fastest response.

Located in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, we feature modern 1, 2, and 3-bedroom loft style apartments and townhomes, many with dens. Our 2 and 3-bedroom townhomes have a fun and industrial feel. That’s because Apex Manayunk expertly blends three brand-new buildings with four historic textile mill structures to create one of the region’s most exciting luxury apartment communities. title: Bright, West-facing, 2, 375 sqft, 3bed/2.5bath paired home
description: Bright, West-facing, 2, 375 sqft, 3bed/2.5bath paired home in Philadelphia Bluff Lake, just a few blocks away from Eastbridge Town Center, Isabella Bird Community School and the Bluff Lake Nature Center! Located in a charming courtyard, this home features warm hardwood floors, elegant crown molding, open concept living, owned solar, and an unfinished basement to add your own personal touch. The main floor includes site-finished hardwood floors, an open concept living space with gas fireplace that flows into the dining room with access to the yard via sliding glass door, and an inviting kitchen; perfect for entertaining! The kitchen includes quartz counters, SS appliances, gas range with double ovens, soft close drawers, and pantry. A powder room and access to the basement and garage are also located off the main level. Upstairs, the airy loft includes hardwood floors, crown molding and a bonus space for a home library or office. The spacious primary bedroom includes a built-in coffee bar, large WIC and a bathroom ensuite with dual sinks, tile floor and glass enclosed shower. Two additional bedrooms with west facing views, a laundry room, as well as a full bath with soaking tub/shower combo complete the second floor. The side yard has a poured concrete patio, raised garden bed and pergola. The drywalled garage offers great storage space with exterior access to the yard. Owned solar from Namaste, so no electric bills monthly! Short walk to F-15 pool and Stanley Marketplace. Access to miles of biking and running trails right outside your door!

title: Cute & Affordable Spruce St. Studio $915
description:
Adorable studio apartment in Philadelphia's best neighborhood at an excellent price! Act fast, you won't find a better deal. For rent (available immediately) is a studio apartment with a small kitchen, bathroom and ample closet space. This is a lease takeover beginning immediately through 3/31/23. As such, at the end of March you have the option of resigning for a year or moving out. The rent is only $915/month and INCLUDES HEAT & HOT WATER! There is laundry in the basement. This is a third floor rear apartment that gets sun and has trees/ivy outside the windows. It is quiet, safe,private and feels like you are up in a treehouse. It is a perfect starter apartment or student rental. I am moving into a larger space with parking, otherwise I wouldn't let it go.
Email with questions/to come by and see the place. This gem won't last.

title: Move In Ready, in the award winning Upper Dublin School District!
description: Move In Ready, in the award winning Upper Dublin School District! Hardwood floors and stairs have been refinished throughout, all rooms newly painted with neutral tones. Newer roof, siding and HVAC, Whole House Generator. Traditional colonial with formal dining room and living room. Eat in kitchen has a sweet bay window and is adjacent to the family room with a brick fire place. Sliders lead from the family room to the back patio and private backyard. A perfect place for morning coffee or to unwind at the end of the day! A large first floor laundry room is adjacent to the kitchen and leads out to the two car garage. A first floor powder room completes this level. Primary suite, three additional bedrooms and a Full Bathroom complete the upper level. The full basement is unfinished and has ample room for storage! Located in close proximity to Upper Dublin High School and major routes including PA Turnpike, 476, 63, 309, Fort Washington and Ambler Train Stations, Temple University Ambler Campus, Lifetime Fitness and historic downtown Ambler with its terrific restaurants and theater. Take a short walk to Mondauk Park and find a walking trail along with soccer and baseball fields. This wonderful family home, in the top rated Upper Dublin School District, is located in a coveted neighborhood enhanced with sidewalks and mature trees.
